name: superops-agentic-ai-itmanagement-aura-team
description: SuperOps Agentic AI IT Management - Aura Team

scripts.install-all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.install:backend: cd aura-backend && python -m pip install -r api-gateway/requirements.txt && python -m pip install -r service-desk-host/requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:frontend:coverage && npm run test:backend:coverage
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:frontend:fix && npm run lint:backend:fix
scripts.dev:restart: npm run dev:stop && npm run dev:local
scripts.setup: npm run install-all && npm run dev:local
scripts.security:scan: npm run security:scan:frontend && npm run security:scan:backend
scripts.security:scan:backend: cd aura-backend && pip install safety && safety check
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:docker
scripts.clean:docker: docker system prune -f && docker volume prune -f
scripts.validate: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.precommit: npm run lint:fix && npm run test
scripts.env:check: node -e "console.log('Node:', process.version); console.log('NPM:', require('child_process').execSync('npm -v', {encoding:'utf8'}).trim())" && python --version && docker --version

author: Aura Team
